title: Brancardier : 8 Years on the Move
description: For 8 years, I worked as a patient transporter in a clinic. It was intense, and human. Teamwork, care, and calm in stressful situations...I learned a lot.

title: Career switch : from care to code
description: Tech had been my passion for 4 years and in 2024, I joined Wild Code School in Toulouse and became a Web & Mobile Developer. I like to understand what I do and do what I understand ; that’s how I build things that make sense.

title: Level Up : The Bachelor
description: Next step: keep learning and go further. In September 2025, I’ll start a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (3rd year) at Ynov Campus Toulouse, in a work-study program. More code, more projects, more growth!
